values.title: Clone model database onto DRC kickoff laptops

content.raw:
Add a step to clone the model database to the DRC kickoff laptops, and add to drcsim's setup.sh to unset GAZEBO_DATABASE_URI.

This is to prevent unnecessary network access during the kickoff tutorial.
content.html:
Add a step to clone the model database to the DRC kickoff laptops, and add to drcsim's setup.sh to unset GAZEBO_DATABASE_URI.

This is to prevent unnecessary network access during the kickoff tutorial.

content.raw: Nominate patches to be included. Prepare pull request with them. Bug fixes only.
content.html: Nominate patches to be included. Prepare pull request with them. Bug fixes only.

values.title: Add cppcheck reporting to drcsim Jenkins jobs

content.raw: After https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/79/added-code-checking-tools/diff goes in, all devel builds of drcsim should run the code_check.sh script and report cppcheck results, using the same configuration as is used for devel builds of gazebo.
content.html: After https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/79/added-code-checking-tools/diff goes in, all devel builds of drcsim should run the code_check.sh script and report cppcheck results, using the same configuration as is used for devel builds of gazebo.

content.raw:
We should have a -dbg .deb of drcsim, similar to what we did with gazebo.  Let's try it out on the prerelease branch first.  I'd like to have this in place for the drcsim 2.0 release, planned for February 1st.

FYI, there might be some issues in building this one debug, as we're chaining into rosbuild in some places, which does some unorthodox things with CMake.
content.html:
We should have a -dbg .deb of drcsim, similar to what we did with gazebo. Let's try it out on the prerelease branch first. I'd like to have this in place for the drcsim 2.0 release, planned for February 1st.

FYI, there might be some issues in building this one debug, as we're chaining into rosbuild in some places, which does some unorthodox things with CMake.

values.title: Merge changes from prerelease to default

content.raw: After we get a successful prerelease deb drcsim, merge relevant changes back to default.
content.html: After we get a successful prerelease deb drcsim, merge relevant changes back to default.

values.title: Update version of Gazebo that's required
consider narrowing drcsim's version dependency on gazebo

content.raw:
[This question](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/1961) seems to demonstrate what can happen if somebody upgrades gazebo without upgrading drcsim.    drcsim 2.1.x probably has a dependency on gazebo >= 1.4.0, which gazebo 1.5.x will satisfy, but with the wrong result.

We should consider narrowing drcsim's dependency to a specific X.Y version of gazebo.  E.g., with drcsim 2.3.0, we would say that it depends on 1.7 > gazebo >= 1.6.0 (we'll have just released gazebo 1.6.0).  Then, in the future, when a user starts with drcsim 2.3.x + gazebo 1.6.x and upgrades to gazebo 1.7.x, `apt-get` will require that drcsim also be upgraded (presumably to 2.4.x).

The cost to this approach is that we might sometimes be more specific than is strictly necessary.  But if and when that happens, all it will take is a no-op re-release of drcsim with updated gazebo version dependencies.
content.html:
This question seems to demonstrate what can happen if somebody upgrades gazebo without upgrading drcsim. drcsim 2.1.x probably has a dependency on gazebo >= 1.4.0, which gazebo 1.5.x will satisfy, but with the wrong result.

We should consider narrowing drcsim's dependency to a specific X.Y version of gazebo. E.g., with drcsim 2.3.0, we would say that it depends on 1.7 > gazebo >= 1.6.0 (we'll have just released gazebo 1.6.0). Then, in the future, when a user starts with drcsim 2.3.x + gazebo 1.6.x and upgrades to gazebo 1.7.x, apt-get will require that drcsim also be upgraded (presumably to 2.4.x).

The cost to this approach is that we might sometimes be more specific than is strictly necessary. But if and when that happens, all it will take is a no-op re-release of drcsim with updated gazebo version dependencies.

content.raw:
Similar to what we did for gazebo and sdformat.

We'll probably soon decided to switch to bloom, but that transition will probably take a while. So I think that it's worth the effort in the meantime to add raring packages to our old-fashioned system.
content.html:
Similar to what we did for gazebo and sdformat.

We'll probably soon decided to switch to bloom, but that transition will probably take a while. So I think that it's worth the effort in the meantime to add raring packages to our old-fashioned system.

values.title: Update dependencies for hydro with rosbuild (3.0)

content.raw:
From [drcsim pull request 377](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/377/fix-build-for-use-with-hydro/diff)

Build dependencies
~~~
osrf-common
ros-hydro-actionlib
ros-hydro-cmake-modules
ros-hydro-control_msgs
ros-hydro-convex-decomposition
ros-hydro-image-transport
ros-hydro-ivcon
ros-hydro-nav-msgs
ros-hydro-pr2-controller-manager
ros-hydro-ros
ros-hydro-rosbuild
ros-hydro-tf
ros-hydro-trajectory_msgs
ros-hydro-urdfdom
ros-hydro-xacro
sandia-hand
~~~

Additional run dependencies:
~~~
ros-hydro-nodelet-topic-tools
ros-hydro-robot-state-publisher
ros-hydro-stereo-image-proc
~~~
content.html:
From drcsim pull request 377

Build dependencies

osrf-common
ros-hydro-actionlib
ros-hydro-cmake-modules
ros-hydro-control_msgs
ros-hydro-convex-decomposition
ros-hydro-image-transport
ros-hydro-ivcon
ros-hydro-nav-msgs
ros-hydro-pr2-controller-manager
ros-hydro-ros
ros-hydro-rosbuild
ros-hydro-tf
ros-hydro-trajectory_msgs
ros-hydro-urdfdom
ros-hydro-xacro
sandia-hand

Additional run dependencies:

ros-hydro-nodelet-topic-tools
ros-hydro-robot-state-publisher
ros-hydro-stereo-image-proc

values.title: groovy control file does not include ros-groovy-robot-state-publisher

content.raw:
It's missing from [precise+groovy and quantal+groovy control file](#!/osrf/drcsim-release/src/087e0deb724b3ab50c9ea80f0d9cc4919ffdbf2c/ubuntu/debian/control?at=default).

Ok for [raring+hydro control file](#!/osrf/drcsim-release/src/087e0deb724b3ab50c9ea80f0d9cc4919ffdbf2c/raring/debian/control?at=default#cl-28)

Without it,
~~~
roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas_v3_sandia_hands.launch 
~~~

content.html: robot_model_visualization/joint_state_publisher does not appear to be used in drcsim, consider removing dependency.

values.title: gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat

content.raw:
Trying to install drcsim via:
```
apt-get install drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: ros-groovy-gazebo-ros (>= 2.4.0) but it is not going to be installed
          Depends: ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins (>= 2.4.0) but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

```
apt-get install ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins : Depends: sdformat but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

```
apt-get install sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-ros : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

```
apt-get install gazebo-current sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-ros : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

```
apt-get install gazebo-current libsdformat-dev  sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 libsdformat-dev : Depends: libsdformat1 (= 1.4.10-1~precise) but it is not going to be installed
                   Conflicts: sdformat but 1.4.9-1~precise is to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

```
apt-get install gazebo-current libsdformat-dev libsdformat1  sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 libsdformat-dev : Conflicts: sdformat but 1.4.9-1~precise is to be installed
 libsdformat1 : Conflicts: sdformat but 1.4.9-1~precise is to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

apt-get install drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: ros-groovy-gazebo-ros (>= 2.4.0) but it is not going to be installed
          Depends: ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins (>= 2.4.0) but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.

apt-get install ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins : Depends: sdformat but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.

apt-get install sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-ros : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.

apt-get install gazebo-current sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-ros : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed

apt-get install gazebo-current libsdformat-dev  sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

                   Conflicts: sdformat but 1.4.9-1~precise is to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.

apt-get install gazebo-current libsdformat-dev libsdformat1  sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:

 libsdformat1 : Conflicts: sdformat but 1.4.9-1~precise is to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.

content.raw:
Our `drcsim` package doesn't install this package but it's used by the multisense head. Example:

https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/src/39750ee2616fcb872e78cbe417ef54f5a79cfd01/drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_v4_bringup.launch?at=default#cl-61
content.html:
Our drcsim package doesn't install this package but it's used by the multisense head. Example:

https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/src/39750ee2616fcb872e78cbe417ef54f5a79cfd01/drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_v4_bringup.launch?at=default#cl-61
